messages.subject: Re: Great backyard bird count
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for posting this, Joyce.  When I read your post to him, my son got so excited that he had me mark the days on our big calendar so that we won t forget.
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for posting this, Joyce. When I read your post to him, my son
got so excited that he had me mark the days on our big calendar so
that we won't forget.

We just bought a North American bird book about two weeks ago and
we've been having fun trying to identify the birds in our yard (we
have the only pesticide free yard in the neighborhood and even our
neighbors notice that we have more birds, butterflies, dragonflies,
etc. than they do ;)

~Carri Ann~
